org.ow2.chameleon.metric
Class MetricService

java.lang.Object
  org.ow2.chameleon.metric.MetricService

public class MetricService
extends Object

The entry point of the metric-service system. It stored all system of units and the converter registry.

It must be a singleton. On OSGi, do not use this class directly, use the exposed metric service.
